description: Test suite for the Nebius model integration in the agno project, including unit tests for agent responses, streaming, async operations, memory, and response models.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: Pydantic model used for testing structured response content, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to assert that response metrics contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests basic agent response to a prompt, verifying content, message roles, and metrics.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response from the agent, ensuring iterator behavior and content presence.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for agent response to a prompt, verifying content, message roles, and metrics.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous test for streaming responses, verifying content presence.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests agent's memory feature, ensuring context is preserved across interactions.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests agent's ability to return structured data conforming to a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests agent's JSON mode, ensuring structured response content.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Verifies that the agent correctly maintains message history across multiple interactions.
